usage.cn: 爱情不是轰轰烈烈的誓言，而是平平淡淡的陪伴。
usage.eng: Love is not the strong vow but the simple accompany.

usage.cn: 我要的，不只是短暂的温柔。
usage.eng: I prefer having your accompanying for life-long time to the short-time tenderness.

usage.cn: 为什么幸福总是擦肩而过,偶尔想你的时候….就让….回忆来陪我.
usage.eng: Why I have never caught the happiness? Whenever I want you ,I will be accompanied by the memory of you.
